cause.description:
Flamenco, a Spanish dance characteristic of Andalucia, has deep historical and traditional roots. Today's youth over look its power, passion, authenticity, and meaning. In fact, many people are completely unfamiliar with this remarkable art form. Flamenco should be available to everyone. From the music, the cante, and the dancing, flamenco can touch EVERYONE in a unique, individualized fashion. ATLEAST GIVE FLAMENCO A CHANCE!
1. To introduce flamenco to the modern society as a powerful means of communication and expression.
cause.mission: preserve the roots and traditions of flamenco set by the gypsies. And to cultivate new life into the art form!
cause.name: Flamenco
